ingredients.content: 100 g pork meat, lean, sinew free, cut in thin strips
5 g sesame oil, plus extra for drizzling
1 pinch ground black pepper, plus extra for sprinkling
15 g dried wood ear mushrooms (see tip)
1560 g water, plus enough extra, hot, for soaking
250 g tofu, cut in small cubes

preparations.content: Place sugar, soy sauce, rice vinegar and salt in mixing bowl then mix <b>5 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place a bowl on mixing bowl lid, weigh in pork and set aside.

Place soy sauce, sherry, cornflour, water, sesame oil, chilli, salt and pepper in mixing bowl then mix <b>5 sec/speed 3<b>. Pour over meat, stir well and leave to marinate for up to 1 hour (see tip). Meanwhile, continue with recipe.

Place a bowl on mixing bowl lid then weigh in shiitake mushrooms, wood ear mushrooms and enokitake mushrooms. Remove bowl from lid then cover with hot water. Set aside and leave to soak for approx. 30 minutes. Drain mushrooms in Varoma dish, squeezing well to remove excess water. Cut mushrooms in small pieces and set aside.
Place a bowl on mixing bowl lid then weigh in cornflour and 60 g water. Remove bowl from lid, stir well and set aside.
Place another bowl on mixing bowl lid and weigh in oil. Remove bowl from lid, add eggs and mix well. Set aside.
Place reserved mushroom pieces, beef stock and remaining 1500 g water in mixing bowl then heat <b>20 min/100°C/speed <b>.
Add reserved meat with marinade and cook <b>5 min/100°C/speed <b>.
Add tofu and reserved cornflour mixture, stir gently with spatula then cook <b>5 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Remove measuring cup and cook <b>1 min/100°C//speed <b>. Meanwhile, add reserved egg mixture through hole in mixing bowl lid.
Add reserved sauce and stir <b>1 min/100°C//speed <b>. Transfer to soup bowls then drizzle with sesame oil and sprinkle with pepper. Garnish with coriander leaves before serving hot.
